page.title: 02DAILY LIFE-A SCHOOL BOY
page.content: On weekdays I{get up}at 8.00 a.m unless its a holiday when I get up about 10.30 a.m.After I get out of bed I clean my teeth and get dressed.For {breakfast}I have a cup of tea and nothing to eat.At 8.45 a.m{I go to {school by car}except on Thursdays when I ride my bike because I am taking my cycling proficiency test at school. {I play}cricket in the summer and football in the winter at playtimes and for ten minutes before the whistle goes in the morning at 8.55 am.when we walk into class. We have an{assembly}at 9.00 am. except Wednesdays when most of the class go swimming at Newquay Pool.I can not go because I have Gommets in my ears. {During the morning}I do mainly topic and language work.
